long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
EPN Chrome extension

Allows you to keep all cards in one extension. Just link a card to your advertising account in a click! Copy and paste card details on any website right in the payment section. Add cards to your favorites in order not to search for the right one for a long time.

How does it work?

You can use the extension in any convenient way:

log in via epn.net (tabs of the target website and epn.net tabs should be in 1 window);
in your personal account, in Settings section, copy the token, paste it in the appropriate input field of the extension window and click Set token;
in the extension window choose Authorize via epn.net, then you will be redirected to the service authorization page epn.net. After successful authorization, you need to restart the extension.
Now you no longer need to install an extension in each new profile. Just download a zip file from the personal account Settings menu, add to your antidetect browser, generate profiles with already installed and authorized extension, and link a card in one click.

It is secure and simple.

Just try it.
